list_definition.definition: being on the other side of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: on the opposite side of town.
The two men walked off in opposite directions.

list_definition.definition: on the opposite side of (something) in relation to something else

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He lives in the house opposite (mine).
Hate is the opposite of love.
